sqlMap.insert:
insert into t_loginlog (
loginlogid
loginuserid
useraccount
username
loginunitcode
loginunitname
loginip
loginmac
logintiime
quittime
) values (
#loginlogid#
#loginuserid#
#useraccount#
#username#
#loginunitcode#
#loginunitname#
#loginip#
#loginmac#
#logintiime:TIMESTAMP#
#quittime:TIMESTAMP#
)
sqlMap.update:
update t_loginlog a set loginlogid=loginlogid
loginuserid=#loginuserid#
useraccount=#useraccount#
username=#username#
loginunitcode=#loginunitcode#
loginunitname=#loginunitname#
loginip=#loginip#
loginmac=#loginmac#
logintiime=#logintiime:TIMESTAMP#
quittime=#quittime:TIMESTAMP#
where 1=1
sqlMap.select:
select x.* from ( select rownum rowno,z.* from (select a.loginlogid loginlogid,a.loginuserid loginuserid,a.useraccount useraccount,a.username username,a.loginunitcode loginunitcode,a.loginunitname loginunitname,a.loginip loginip,a.loginmac loginmac,a.logintiime logintiime,a.quittime quittime from t_loginlog a where 1=1
a.useraccount like '%$useraccount$%'
a.username like '%$username$%'
a.loginip like '%$loginip$%'
a.logintiime >= #logintiimef:TIMESTAMP#
a.logintiime < #logintiimet:DATE#+1
order by $pageSort$) z) x where rowno >$beginRow$ and rowno <= $endRow$

select count(1) a from t_loginlog a where 1=1
a.useraccount like '%$useraccount$%'
a.username like '%$username$%'
a.loginip like '%$loginip$%'
a.logintiime >= #logintiimef:TIMESTAMP#
a.logintiime < #logintiimet:DATE#+1

select a.loginlogid loginlogid,a.loginuserid loginuserid,a.useraccount useraccount,a.username username,a.loginunitcode loginunitcode,a.loginunitname loginunitname,a.loginip loginip,a.loginmac loginmac,a.logintiime logintiime,a.quittime quittime from t_loginlog a where 1=1
order by a.loginlogid

select a.loginlogid loginlogid,a.loginuserid loginuserid,a.useraccount useraccount,a.username username,a.loginunitcode loginunitcode,a.loginunitname loginunitname,a.loginip loginip,a.loginmac loginmac,a.logintiime logintiime,a.quittime quittime from t_loginlog a where 1=1
order by a.loginlogid

select count(1) from t_loginlog a where 1=1
a.logintiime >= trunc(#kssj:DATE#)
a.logintiime < trunc(#jssj:DATE#)+1

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE departbrevitycode, PCS.DEPARTNAME DEPARTNAME, NVL(loginlog.dlzs,'0') as dlzs FROM (SELECT DEPT.DEPARTCODE, DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE, DEPT.DEPARTNAME, DEPT.NODEORDER FROM T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = ((select t.departlevel from t_department t where t.departbrevitycode='$gxdwbm$')+1) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE '$gxdwbm$%' order by DEPT.nodeorder ) PCS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(log.LOGINUNITCODE, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) PAICHUSUOBM, count(*) dlzs FROM t_loginlog log, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = ((select t.departlevel from t_department t where t.departbrevitycode='$gxdwbm$')+1) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE '$gxdwbm$%' AND log.LOGINUNITCODE LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%' and log.LOGINTIIME >= trunc(#kssj:DATE#) and log.LOGINTIIME < trunc(#jssj:DATE#)+1 GROUP BY SUBSTR(log.LOGINUNITCODE, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) ) loginlog
WHERE PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = loginlog.PAICHUSUOBM(+)
) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= #endRow# ) WHERE RN > #beginRow#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = ((select t.departlevel from t_department t where t.departbrevitycode='$gxdwbm$')+1) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE '$gxdwbm$%' order by dept.nodeorder

SELECT '$gxdwbm$' departbrevitycode, '合计' DEPARTNAME, NVL(sum(A.dlzs),'0') dlzs
FROM ( SELECT PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE departbrevitycode, PCS.DEPARTNAME DEPARTNAME, NVL(loginlog.dlzs,'0') as dlzs FROM (SELECT DEPT.DEPARTCODE, DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE, DEPT.DEPARTNAME, DEPT.NODEORDER FROM T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = ((select t.departlevel from t_department t where t.departbrevitycode='$gxdwbm$')+1) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE '$gxdwbm$%' order by DEPT.nodeorder ) PCS,
(SELECT SUBSTR(log.LOGINUNITCODE, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) PAICHUSUOBM, count(*) dlzs FROM t_loginlog log, T_DEPARTMENT DEPT WHERE DEPT.DEPARTLEVEL = ((select t.departlevel from t_department t where t.departbrevitycode='$gxdwbm$')+1) AND DEPT.DEPARTCODE LIKE '$gxdwbm$%' AND log.LOGINUNITCODE LIKE DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE || '%' and log.LOGINTIIME >= trunc(#kssj:DATE#) and log.LOGINTIIME < trunc(#jssj:DATE#)+1 GROUP BY SUBSTR(log.LOGINUNITCODE, 0, LENGTH(DEPT.DEPARTBREVITYCODE)) ) loginlog
WHERE PCS.DEPARTBREVITYCODE = loginlog.PAICHUSUOBM(+)
) A
